front.title: Extensions to support efficient carrying of multicast traffic in Layer-2 Tunneling Protocol (L2TP)

abstract.t: The Layer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) provides a standard method for tunneling PPP packets. This document describes an extension to L2TP, in order to have an efficient use of L2TP tunnels within the context of deploying multicast services whose data will have to be conveyed by such tunnels.
